entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (rtp_mon_mothma_main.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_13: Not now trooper. I'm trying to pinpoint the location of a stray Imperial reconnaissance droid. Report to Admiral Ackbar if you wish to serve.
entries.s_14: According to information from the droid, two ruthless Imperial generals are present at an Imperial base on Dantooine as is an assassin who has been hired to take out General Dodonna and Admiral Ackbar. You must eliminate these threats to the Rebel Alliance.
entries.s_20: Excellent work! Those Imperial generals were responsible for a lot of damage to the Rebel Alliance. We'll all sleep a bit easier now. Well, not you. You are to travel to Yavin IV and report to General Dodonna.
entries.s_32: Retrieve that damaged Imperial reconnaissance droid. We have its general location, but you'll have to narrow it down from there. We must have whatever information is stored within that droid.
entries.s_34: Finished with Admiral Ackbar? Excellent. You are to retrieve a damaged Imperial reconnaissance droid. You are to find it.
entries.s_38: We have the droid's general location, but you'll have to narrow it down from there. We must have whatever information is stored within that droid.
entries.s_43: Return when you are on active duty, soldier.
entries.s_44: There is nothing for you here.
